location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.143 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay

mods.abstract: Kemball writes of incidents occurring on parts of the Trucial Coast ruled by the sheikhs of Abu Dhabi and Dubai, which contravene the Maritime Truce. Kemball states that he has written to Commodore Porter of the Indian Naval Squadron, asking that patrols of the coast and mouth of the Gulf be undertaken.
